cal3d::noncopyable

cal3d::noncopyable Class Reference

Derive from noncopyable to mark your class as not having a copy constructor or operator=. More...

#include <global.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Derive from noncopyable to mark your class as not having a copy constructor or operator=.
